tool.name: PDAUG Sequence Similarity Network
tool.description: Analyze peptide descriptor data using scatter plot
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool calculates Levenshtein distance between peptide sequences and plots the data in the form of a sequence similarity network.
-----
**Inputs** * **--InFile** Takes peptide sequences as fasta file.
-----
**Outputs** * Return html report file.
